sections.heading: credit; distribution.Any tax credit allowable to a partnership, a limited liability company, a subchapter S corporation, or an estate or trust may be distributed to the partners, limited liability company members, shareholders, or beneficiaries in the same manner as income is distributed

sections.text:
77-7020.Tax credit; distribution.

Any tax credit allowable to a partnership, a limited liability company, a subchapter S corporation, or an estate or trust may be distributed to the partners, limited liability company members, shareholders, or beneficiaries in the same manner as income is distributed.

SourceLaws 2024, LB937, ยง 53.Termination Date: January 1, 2035
